attributes.action: Abolish Sunday trading laws and make 24 hour shopping 24 hour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have many shops and supermarkets in this country that are allowed to open and trade 24 hours a day, unless that day is Sunday where they are limited in thier total opening hours.

Make 24 hours mean 24 hours and allow people to shop when they want without forcing shops to close on Sunday.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "abolish Sunday trading laws and make 24 hour shopping 24 hour."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10789.asp
